document.heading: Genetic Tests for the Establishment of Paternity Amendment Temporary Act of 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-72, the “Genetic Tests for the Establishment of Paternity Amendment Temporary Act of 1989,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-429. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 24, 1989, and November 7, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 13, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-111 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 8-72 became effective on March 8, 1990.
